alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:00PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total slushy snow accumulations of up to one to possibly two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Iowa, Buchanan, Delaware and Dubuque Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact Tuesday morning`s commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
